title: About Gia - Mind and Body Therapies

Read More
cleaned_text: Prior to working as a therapist, at the age of 33, Gia experienced breast cancer and was urged on a journey of self-discovery. She began studying more about the mind, body and spirit, and for the last 15 years has been practising as a remedial massage therapist, counsellor, educator and public speaker in the area of health and wellbeing. She has also completed a primary course with ACNEM~ Australian College of Nutritional and Environmental Medicine and incorporates this knowledge in her sessions with her clients for their health and wellbeing. She has completed 2 years of study for a Bachelor of Health Science - Nutritional Medicine at Endeavour College. Gia provides a space for you to be supported and to: - Maintain your health and wellbeing - Resolves pain as in headaches aches, back pain, neck pain, and inflammation as bursitis. - Detox your mind and body - Release physical and emotional tension/pain - Relax and rejuvenate - Improve your muscle and skin tone - Improve your self esteem and self love - Heal from grief and loss - Develop and incorporate strategies to help you overcome anxiety and depression - Develop and incorporate stress management skills in your life - Learn to quieten the mind - Gain knowledge on your nutritional and environmental needs QUALIFICATIONS - Bachelor in Early Childhood Education - Graduate Diploma in Community Languages - Masters in Social Science (Counselling Studies) - Diploma in Remedial Massage - Certificate IV in Personal Counselling TA - Certificate in Therapeutic Touch Therapy I and II - Certificate in Reiki I and II - Certificate in Level 2 CranioSacral Therapy - Certificate in Manual Lympatic Drainage - Completed 2 years of Bachelor in Health Science - Naturopathy
